explains: n. 自我怀疑；缺少自信

sentences.en: She is assailed by self-doubt and emotional insecurity.
sentences.cn: 她被自我怀疑和情感不安所困扰。

sentences.en: She is always assailed by self-doubt and emotional insecurity.
sentences.cn: 她总是被自我怀疑和情感上的不安全感所困扰。

sentences.en: Self-doubt began to gnaw away at her confidence.
sentences.cn: 对自己的怀疑渐渐吞噬了她的自信心。
